markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="">[Caster's Imposition](/Spells.aspx?ID=1215)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Curse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=38" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 78</row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Target** 1 creature within 60 feet
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Will

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

A magical interference prevents the target from contributing to any form of cooperative spellcasting. On a failed save, the target can't participate in any ritual unless they can cast the ritual alone, and they can't access any spells provided by a [coven](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=11) or similar cooperative ability.

---
**Heightened (4th)** Increase the duration to 1 hour.

**Heightened (5th)** Increase the duration to 1 day.
name: Caster's Imposition
